channel.title: Compatible Micro SD
channel.description:
Hi I would like to know the list of uSDs supported by mangOH Green. In particular I would like to know what is the maximum size of the uSD it supports.
I read on the other topics that there was a problem on the uSD that could be solved with release 12 at the end of 2017. Now is there any news?
